dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach finding creative solutions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on systematic analysis and evidence-based reasoning to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts, making connections between seemingly unrelated ideas to find innovative solutions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will absorb and retain information better through visual aids, diagrams, and images.
Your FarTwin will prefer learning through sound, music, and verbal instructions.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves in writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will write clearly and efficiently, conveying complex ideas with precision.
Your FarTwin will use descriptive language to paint vivid pictures in the reader's mind.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confidently express their opinions and needs, standing up for themselves.
Your FarTwin will prioritize building strong relationships and consensus, even if it means compromising.

dimensions.label: Technology Adoption
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will quickly learn and adjust to new software, hardware, and systems.
Your FarTwin may be hesitant to adopt new technology, preferring familiar methods and tools.

dimensions.label: Book Preference
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach reading material?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thoroughly analyze and interpret complex texts, requiring time and effort.
Your FarTwin will skim through books, focusing on key points and summaries rather than in-depth analysis.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements or conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will address issues head-on, speaking directly and assertively to resolve the conflict.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground, facilitating a resolution that works for all parties involved.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, adjusting their schedule as needed.
Your FarTwin will stick to a routine, prioritizing tasks and deadlines to achieve goals efficiently.
